document_data.name: ''Spear of Halama''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Spear of Halama''''' was an enchanted spear once carried by the [[elf]] heroine [[Halama]].''<nowiki/>''
document_data.Powers: The spear functioned as a ''+2'' weapon. It also allowed the wielder to fly for up to an hour per day. Additionally, the spear granted the wielder immunity from [[dragon breath]].
document_data.Rumors & Legends: The spear was rumored to be a gift to Halama from a [[gold dragon]].
